Plot: 5 youths give chase after a man who has stolen 8 million rubles from them. The man reveals on his video blog his intention to travel to Chernobyl. With every kilometer the journey of the heroes becomes more dangerous and confusing.
Title: Chernobyl: Zona otchuzhdeniya
Actors: Konstantin Davydov, Valerya Dmitrieva, Kristina Kazinskaya, Anvar Khalilulaev
